summary: An Ordinance accepting a deed, executed on the 12th day of March, A. D., 1908, by C. K. Sturtevant and Emily L. Sturtevant, his wife, to the City of Seattle, for a part of Reserve No. 3, Block 33, C. D. Hillman's Meadow Garden Addition to the City of Seattle, Division 4; a part of Tracts 5 & 6, W. W. Kriegel's Subdivision of Tract "G" of Sommerville Five Acre Tracts; a part of the S. W. 1/4 of the S. W. 1/4 of the S. W. 1/4 and West 1/2 of the S. E. 1/4 of the S. W. 1/4 of the S. W. 1/4 of Section 22, Township 24, Range 4 East; a part of the South 1/2 of the N. E. 1/4 of the S. E. 1/4 of the N. E. 1/4 of Section 3, Township 23, Range 4 East; a part of the East 1/2 of the S. E. 1/4 of the S. W. 1/4 of the S. W. 1/4 of Section 22, Township 24, Range 4 East, and also for certain rights and privileges to excavate, lay down, maintain and operate for all purposes whatever water mains and water pipes in all the alleys, streets, avenues, driveways, highways, public places and reserves in Hillman City Addition to the City of Seattle, Division No. 1, Division No. 2, Division No. 3, and Division No. 5.
